mapper.insert: INSERT INTO banner_db (banner_code, banner_name, banner_alt, banner_image, banner_originalname, banner_seq) VALUES('B'||LPAD(banner_seq.nextval, 3, '0'), #{banner_name}, #{banner_alt}, #{banner_image}, #{banner_originalname}, (select nvl(max(banner_seq), 0)+1 from banner_db))
mapper.select: SELECT banner_seq, banner_code, banner_name, banner_alt, banner_originalname FROM banner_db
